content.rendered:
A system to capture high concentrations of platelet rich plasma (PRP)1, 2

81% platelet yield1, 2

Short processing time1, 2

Up to 5x platelet concentration*1, 2

Up to 94% removal of WBCs1, 2

≤ 0.1%Removes almost all RBCs1, 2(≤ 0.1% remain)

*Mean platelet concentration by removing ~10 mL of Platelet Poor Plasma (PPP).

Multiple sizes offer greater flexibility

  • 6 minute spin
  • 13 mL blood draw
  • 6.5 mL PRP yield
  • 10 minute spin
  • 30 mL blood draw
  • 15.6 mL PRP yield

Find out how you can get ideal platelet concentrations for your patients.

Contact a Representative REFERENCES:
  1. Amplifine HD PRP Gel Tube (15 and 30 mL) [Instructions for Use]. San Diego, CA: Suneva Medical, Inc.; 2020.
  2. PRP Optimization Testing, Data on file. Suneva Medical, Inc.
